attributes.action: Conduct a Public Enquiry into Conwy County Council's bankrupting of Victoria Pier, Colwyn Bay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following a long dispute over knowingly incorrect Council Tax and Business Rates bills due at Victoria Pier, Colwyn Bay, which Conwy County Borough Council (CCBC) refused to correct, CCBC bankrupted the Pier owner after he refused to pay their untrue claim.  We call on the Government to conduct a full Public Enquiry into CCBC's handling of the whole affair.

government_responses.details:
